author: dgraham
msg: Added TagUtils class for taglibs to use instead of RequestUtils.  We should
migrate any method in RequestUtils that takes a PageContext parameter
and/or throws JspException.  A clean separation will help keep RequestUtils
smaller and allow the taglibs to be easily split off of the core Struts distro.

author: dgraham
msg: Deprecated Resources.getLocale() because it created sessions.  Use

author: dgraham
msg: getLocale() now calls RequestUtils.getUserLocale() to prevent session
